responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can give you advice on your love relationship. Ask me about your communication, common interests or betrayal.

patterns: How can I communicate with them better?
They don't pay attention to what I'm saying
responses: You should try to talk about it peacefully in an environment where both of you feel safe.
Try organize your thoughts better by writing them all down. Maybe try writing them a letter?

patterns: We don't have much in common
I don't like what they do
responses: You can try to engage in more activities together to develop common interests
Maybe you can try doing something together to find something you both enjoy

patterns: They didn't tell me the truth
responses: You should talk about it opening and try to find a solution together. Only you can decide how your relationship can go on.
Try to tell them your true feelings and that their behaviours hurted you.
